tag_list: ceo, entepreneur, development, company, network, gigacast, gmage
overview:
Peter Matejbus is CEO of GigaCast social network. Visionary, investor and philantrophy.

Leader and creator of social network GigaCast and online photogallery gMage.

Peter has graduated on Business Academy in Nitra, Slovakia. Currently studying in the Matej Bel University, faculty of Internatinonal Relations.

Projecting inovative applications for Web 2.0 based on idea of social networking, communication and organizing. Creating ultimate network for people, to make their networking even more complex and full of new information and experiences.

image.attribution: Peter Matejbus / Peter Matejbus

milestones.description: GigaCast social network was launched as alpha
